title: Frameworks
description: Explore ready-made solutions to speed up the creation of interactive and high-performance websites.

elements.title: React
elements.description: A JavaScript library developped by Facebook which allows you to easily create web applications by mounting components together.

elements.title: Vue.js
elements.description: A JavaScript framework used to build user interfaces and web applications originally created by Evan You.

elements.title: Angular
elements.description: A TypeScript-based open-source web application framework co-managed by the "Angular" team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.

elements.title: Symfony
elements.description: A PHP framework used to build web applications and APIs. It is based on the MVC pattern and is one of the most popular PHP frameworks.

elements.title: Django
elements.description: An open-source Python framework which makes web development easier based on code re-use.

elements.title: Ruby on Rails
elements.description: An open-source web framework which follows the MVC design pattern. It offers a structure that make web development in Ruby easier.

elements.title: Laravel
elements.description: An open-source web framework written in PHP which follows the MVC design pattern and fully developped in object-oriented programming.

elements.title: Astro
elements.description: A JavaScript web framework for building content-focused websites based on components.

elements.title: Express
elements.description: A JavaScript framework made to build web applications based on Node.js. It is used to build APIs and web servers.

elements.title: Fastify
elements.description: A JavaScript framework used to make APIs and web servers based on Node.js.

elements.title: Spring
elements.description: An open-source web framework written in Java used to easily build and define application structure facilitate the tests.
